property.description:
Click here to display column definitions
  • Inbound: Write Throughput of the node.
  • Outbound: Read Throughput of the node.
  • Total: Total Throughput of the node.
  • HDD Used: Used Capacity on HDD.
  • HDD Size: Capacity of the HDD.
  • SSD Used: Used Capacity on SSD.
  • SSD Size: Capacity of the SSD.
  • Status: Indicates the availability status.

Click here to display column definitions
  • In: Write Throughput of the drive.
  • Out: Read Throughput of the drive.
  • Disk Size: Raw Capacity of the drive.
  • Status: Indicates the availability status.

property.filterExpression: (name=='Capacity' | name=='UsedCapacity' | name=='RealCapacity' | name=='VirtualCapacity') & source=='SVC-Collector' & parttype=='VirtualPool' & datatype=='Virtual'

((name=='RawCapacity' | name=='ConfiguredUsableCapacity') & !(part) | (name=='Capacity' | name=='UsedCapacity' | name=='SubscribedCapacity') & parttype=='Storage Pool') & devtype=='Array' & source=='VMAX-Collector'

((name=='RawCapacity' | name=='ConfiguredUsableCapacity') & !(parttype) | (name=='Capacity' | name=='UsedCapacity' | name=='SubscribedCapacity') & parttype=='Storage Pool') & devtype=='Array' & source=='VNXBlock-Collector'

((name=='RawCapacity' | name=='ConfiguredUsableCapacity') & datagrp=='XIV-SAF' | (name=='Capacity' | name=='UsedCapacity' | name=='SubscribedCapacity') & parttype=='Storage Pool') & devtype=='Array' & source=='XIV-Collector'
